title: Foundations of Iterative Learning Control (ILC) for Linear Time-Varying System Tracking Control

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Foundational education for transitioning into mechanical engineering applications, including robotics control

learning_goals: Learners can explain fundamental principles of solving tracking problems in linear time-varying systems using ILC techniques
Learners can implement iterative learning controllers applying the Dα-type update law in MATLAB/Simulink environments
Learners can analyze ILC design conditions applicable to real systems through initial state learning techniques
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
